name: R'lyeh
description: A cyclopean city sunk beneath the waves, R'lyeh imprisons Cthulhu and other Great Old Ones. Its emergence from the depths spells doom for humanity.

name: Mountains of Madness
description: A desolate, alien mountain range where an ancient, extinct race of star-headed beings once dwelt. Their forbidden knowledge and grisly secrets corrupt the minds of explorers who dare venture there.

name: Plateau of Leng
description: A blasted wasteland existing outside of normal time and space. Here, shoggoths, amoeba-like creatures of pure id, dwell and serve unspeakable powers.
